channel.title: The tab dcs my players when clicked please help :(
channel.description:
my cmd has this this error when i click the tab with the pencil bottom right last interface tab it becomes instant dc 602 Animation Amount: 13798 508 Object Amount: 38424 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Width: 560 Height: 165 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:10838) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2974) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10598) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11585) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:173) at client.run(client.java:6355) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[url=http://screensnapr.com/v/BPOg1A.jpg]http://screensnapr.com/v/BPOg1A.jpg[/url] i also get this error at when i log in with one of my accounts and dcs me [url=http://screensnapr.com/v/4bGXgo.jpg]http://screensnapr.com/v/4bGXgo.jpg[/url] Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 21777 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:173) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:1471) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10918) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2974) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10598) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11585) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:173) at client.run(client.java:6355) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ive tryed changing sprites etc ive been trying fix it since saturday and im hoping omeone could help me out im going nuts from this :\

item.title: The tab dcs my players when clicked please help :(
item.dc:creator: @Bobbinforbud Bobbinforbud
item.description:
@Bobbinforbud wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:5, topic:474039”][quote author=Bobbinforbud link=topic=591977.msg4183380#msg4183380 date=1355800509]

its tells you exactly where your problem is :
AT client.java: LINE:10838
AT client.java: LINE:2974
etc
etc
etc…

how do i tell lines for future refernce sorry im just learning

It’s because something is wrong with the Interface. You can disable the clicking area coordinates for the Tab if you just want to remove it (client-side).

that is what im trying to do will i find the disable in rsinterfae .java and to disable its “-1” right?
[/quote]

That’s what people usually do to disable their Interface being set Server-sided. You can just comment out the Mouse Coordinates Client-side. These are probably in your Client class.[/quote]

im very confused you think you can show me via teamviewer?

Read full topic
item.source: The tab dcs my players when clicked please help :(

item.title: The tab dcs my players when clicked please help :(
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Bobbinforbud, post:4, topic:474039”][quote author=RSPS222 link=topic=591977.msg4183029#msg4183029 date=1355774271]
its tells you exactly where your problem is :
AT client.java: LINE:10838
AT client.java: LINE:2974
etc
etc
etc…
[/quote]
how do i tell lines for future refernce sorry im just learning

It’s because something is wrong with the Interface. You can disable the clicking area coordinates for the Tab if you just want to remove it (client-side).

that is what im trying to do will i find the disable in rsinterfae .java and to disable its “-1” right?[/quote]

That’s what people usually do to disable their Interface being set Server-sided. You can just comment out the Mouse Coordinates Client-side. These are probably in your Client class.

Read full topic

item.title: The tab dcs my players when clicked please help :(
item.dc:creator: @Bobbinforbud Bobbinforbud
item.description:
@Bobbinforbud wrote:

[quote=“RSPS222, post:2, topic:474039”]its tells you exactly where your problem is :
AT client.java: LINE:10838
AT client.java: LINE:2974
etc
etc
etc…[/quote]
how do i tell lines for future refernce sorry im just learning

Team_Rocket:

It’s because something is wrong with the Interface. You can disable the clicking area coordinates for the Tab if you just want to remove it (client-side).

that is what im trying to do will i find the disable in rsinterfae .java and to disable its “-1” right?

Read full topic

item.title: The tab dcs my players when clicked please help :(
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

It’s because something is wrong with the Interface. You can disable the clicking area coordinates for the Tab if you just want to remove it (client-side).
